title: 820-00165, fan spin but no video.
message:
Hi,
Board came with a little speck of water damage, only caps C5002, C5010 and C5017, near SMC, where damage and nasty, charger didn't have light and no fan spin.
I change the 3 caps and now board have light in charger,  and fan spin, but no image in screen or external monitor.
CPU gets hot, but fans don´t speed up.

PP3V42 and PPBUS_G3H have normal values.

Any ideas?

title: 820-00165, fan spin but no video.
message: Always reball SMC, if detect corrosion close to it.
